introduction: In a closed universe, a man takes care of a flower and ages with it.The setting: a room, a table, a chequered floor, nothing else, except a flower placed there...A young man pushes an older man to take his place and possess the flower.He smells it, tastes it with delight, but tries to trample it...Life passes, the flower withers. However the decrepitude of the man will not be right of it. A new individual will take over and breathe life into it.1986 - Film 35mm - Color - 8' - Directed by Alain Ughetto
